message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget concerns.  While $120 is my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $110 for you. I believe this product will be a valuable asset, and this is a fair offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly settle on $100 for the product?
